title: CR-019 Template Loading Missing revision_summary Field

comment: NON-COMPLIANT: Section 7 Remediation Plan contains placeholder text in CAPA-002 Implementation column: '[Implementation TBD - options include: ...]'. All TBD/TODO/placeholder content must be resolved before pre-approval. The initiator must specify the concrete implementation approach for CAPA-002 (e.g., which option from the list will be pursued, or a specific CR reference). All other aspects of the document are compliant: frontmatter verified (title='CR-019 Template Loading Missing revision_summary Field', revision_summary='Initial draft'), all required sections present, root cause analysis is thorough, no other placeholder content found.

COMPLIANT. Previous feedback addressed: CAPA-002 Implementation column now specifies '[CR to evaluate options and implement: QA agent definition, SOP amendment, standalone review SOP, or enhanced inbox task templates]' instead of TBD placeholder. Frontmatter verified: title='CR-019 Template Loading Missing revision_summary Field', revision_summary='Initial draft'. All 10 required INV sections present. No placeholder content in substantive sections. Document ready for approval routing.

NON-COMPLIANT: Document contains placeholder content that must be resolved before approval. (1) Section 7 CAPA table contains bracket placeholders [CR to modify qms.py], [Pass/Fail], [VERIFIER] - [DATE]. (2) Section 8 Execution Comments contains template placeholders [COMMENT], [PERFORMER] - [DATE]. (3) Section 9 Execution Summary contains [EXECUTION_SUMMARY] placeholder. Per SOP-001 and QA review criteria, placeholder content is not permitted in controlled documents. Revise to either populate with actual values or use appropriate text indicating status (e.g., 'Pending execution' for Section 9, remove placeholder rows from Section 8 if no comments exist).
